何気無く: (なにげなく) - unintentionally; calmly; inadvertently; innocently
何物: (なにもの) - something; nothing (with neg. verb)
何用: (なによう) - what kind of business; what sort of matter
何百個: (なんびゃっこ) - large number of items
何等: (なにら) - whatever/what/what sort of/any kind of; nothing whatever (with neg. verb)
何等か: (なんらか) - some; any; in any way; of some kind; of some sort
何箇月: (なんかげつ) - how many months?; how long?
何糞: (なにくそ) - damn it!; dang it!
何者: (なにもの) - who; what kind of person
何色搨: (なんしょくずり) - multicolored printing; multicoloured printing
何處: (いどこ) - where/what place; how much (long, far)/what extent
何言うとんねん: (なにいうとんねん) - what the hell are you saying?
何遍: (なんべん) - how many times; how often
何食わぬ顔: (なにくわぬかお) - innocent look; nonchalant look; air of innocence
佗しい: (わびしい) - miserable; wretched; lonely; dreary; shabby; comfortless
佗び: (わび) - the beauty to be found in poverty and simplicity; subdued taste; quiet refinement; sober refinement; wabi
佗びる: (わびる) - to be worried; to be grieved; to pine for
佗人: (わびびと) - lonesome person; unwanted person; poverty-stricken person
佗住い: (わびずまい) - solitary life; wretched abode
佗住居: (わびずまい) - solitary life; wretched abode
佗助椿: (ワビスケツバキ) - Camellia japonica 'Wabisuke' (cultivar of common camellia)
佗歌: (わびうた) - sad song; singing in a lonesome tone
佗言: (わびごと) - sad words; anxious words
余し物: (あましもの) - something not needed; person who is in the way
余す: (あます) - to save; to leave over; to spare
余すところなく: (あますところなく) - fully; thoroughly
余す所なく: (あますところなく) - fully; thoroughly
余す所無く: (あますところなく) - fully; thoroughly
余っ程: (よっぽど) - (余 is ateji) very/greatly/much/to a large extent/quite; just about to
余の辞書に不可能という文字はない: (よのじしょにふかのうというもじはない) - the word impossible is not in my dictionary
余の辞書に不可能という文字は無い: (よのじしょにふかのうというもじはない) - the word impossible is not in my dictionary
余り: (amari) - resto, sobra, restante, saldo, excedente, restos (de uma refeição), sobras; não muito, pouco; demais, excessivamente, excessivo; extremo, grande, severo, tremendo, terrível
余りに: (あまりに) - too much; excessively; too
余りにも: (あまりにも) - too much; excessive; too
余り物: (あまりもの) - remains; leavings; remnant; surplus
余り物に福がある: (あまりものにふくがある) - Leftovers are the best of all
余り物に福が有る: (あまりものにふくがある) - Leftovers are the best of all
余り面白くない: (あまりおもしろくない) - not very interesting
余る: (あまる) - to remain; to be left over; to be in excess; to be too many
余世: (よせい) - one's remaining years; the rest of one's life
余事: (よじ) - other things; the rest; leisure tasks
余人をもって代えがたい: (よじんをもってかえがたい) - hard to replace (with other person)
余人をもって代え難い: (よじんをもってかえがたい) - hard to replace (with other person)
余人を以て代えがたい: (よじんをもってかえがたい) - hard to replace (with other person)
余人を以て代え難い: (よじんをもってかえがたい) - hard to replace (with other person)
余儀ない: (よぎない) - unavoidable; inevitable; beyond one's control
余儀なくされる: (よぎなくされる) - to be forced to do or experience something (against one's will); to be forced to do something because one has no other choice
余儀無い: (よぎない) - unavoidable; inevitable; beyond one's control
余党: (よとう) - remnants; survivors; refugees; pocket (of resistance)
余剰人員: (よじょうじんいん) - excess personnel; redundant staff
余力: (よりょく) - spare energy, time or money; remaining strength; reserve power; money to spare
余勢: (よせい) - surplus power; momentum; impetus; inertia
余命: (よめい) - remainder of one's life; one's remaining years
余命幾何もない: (よめいいくばくもない) - your days are numbered
余喘: (よぜん) - lingering life; feeble existence; brink of ruin
余孽: (よげつ) - (esp. 余蘖)  sprouts from a stump; (esp. 余孽) ruined family surviving through a descendant
余徳: (よとく) - influence of great virtue; influence of ancestors
余念がない: (よねんがない) - being concentrating one one thing; devote oneself completely to something
余念が無い: (よねんがない) - being concentrating one one thing; devote oneself completely to something
余念なく: (よねんなく) - earnestly; intently; attentively; wholeheartedly
